description:
An advocate for anyone embroiled in civil or criminal legal issues, our team at Kimberly C. Haugh, P.C., serves clients in Abingdon and throughout Southwestern Virginia, from Lee County to Wytheville. Our law office handles a full spectrum of matters, including the following:

  • Criminal law: sex offenses, domestic violence, drug crimes, traffic violations, DUI/DWI
  • Family law: divorce, custody, child support, fathers' rights
  • Lemon law and landlord/tenant disputes
  • Personal injury: motor vehicle accidents, medical malpractice, animal bites, premises liability, product liability, wrongful death
  • Sexual harassment
  • Estate planning: probate, wills, estate administration

In short, we have the ability to help people when they need it most. As compassionate attorneys, we listen when our clients share their stories. The team at our law office recognizes that every case is unique. Each person has his or her own circumstances and goals. That is why each strategy we develop is customized to the specific needs of the client.

At our law office, we have more than 15 years of experience in negotiating on behalf of clients and going to court when those discussions fail to produce a fair result. We seek efficient solutions that reduce the amount of time and money that are invested in a case. To accommodate the people we represent, Kimberly C. Haugh, P.C., accepts all major credit cards.
